name: Confusion
description: You attempt to enter the mind of a target and cause confusion. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 + MOVE psychic damage. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target becomes confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
optional: Instead of a roll of 15 or higher, the target must make a WIS save against your MOVE DC. On failure, the target becomes confused.
